metadata.title: CVE-2022-4289 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.3 before 15.7.8, versions of 15.8 before 15.8.4, and version 15.9 before15.9.2. Google IAP details in Prometheus integration were not hidden, couldbe leaked from instance, group, or project settings to other users.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
